senya22 wrote:

> I need to test that primitive constituents of a composite pattern are
> done in a certain order in my framework according to funct. specs ,
> how would you suggest this is best tested in JUnit? Are there any
> asserts for order? I'm using version 4.

I would do this by subclassing the template method and overriding the 
primitive operations with code uses the LogString pattern (Beck's TDD: 
By Example). This way you'd have the order in which the methods were 
invoked. If you need something more complete than just method names, 
consider integrating the Expectation classes from JMock.

Good luck.
